Title: Barney's Great Adventure
Writer: Stephen White (story), Sheryl Leach (story), Dennis DeShazer (story), Stephen White, Sheryl Leach ("Barney and the Backyard Gang" and "Barney & Friends" developed by), Kathy Parker ("Barney and the Backyard Gang" and "Barney & Friends" developed by), Dennis DeShazer ("Barney and the Backyard Gang" and "Barney & Friends" developed by)
Actors: Alan Fawcett, Jane Wheeler, Kyla Pratt, Diana Rice
Plot: Mom and dad dump son Cody, daughter Abby, her best friend Marcella and a baby on the farm with Grandpa and Grandma. Purple dinosaur Barney soon appears to entertain kids, and when a large colorful egg deposited on a farm by a shooting star is accidentally carted off, Barney and kids start their chase for it.
